title: Getting Started
text:
In order for you to be able to use this Note Taker, you must include a title and body text for your notes.

To create a new note:
Click the â• icon on the right corner of the screen. 

To save a note:
Click the ğŸ’¾ icon. You'll be able to come back at any time and retrieve your saved notes. 

To delete a note: 
Click the ğŸ—‘ï¸ icon next to the respective note you'd like to delete.
